feat: Add multi-guard shift endpoints (Phase 2 - Part 2)

Updated shift endpoints to support multiple guards per shift with assignment workflow.

New Shift Assignment Endpoints:
- GET /shifts/{shift_id}/assignments - List all guards assigned to a shift
- POST /shifts/{shift_id}/assign/{employee_id} - Manually assign guard to shift
- DELETE /shifts/{shift_id}/assignments/{employee_id} - Remove guard from shift
- POST /shifts/{shift_id}/assignments/{assignment_id}/confirm - Confirm pending assignment
- GET /employees/{employee_id}/shifts - Get all shifts for an employee

Features:
- Assignment status workflow: pending → confirmed → completed
- Prevents duplicate assignments (unique constraint)
- Checks shift capacity (required_staff limit)
- Validates shift and employee existence
- Calculates assignment costs automatically
- Supports manual and roster-based assignments

Workflow:
1. Guards assigned to shifts (manual or via roster)
2. Assignments created with ''pending'' status
3. Admin reviews and confirms assignments
4. Status changes to ''confirmed''
5. After shift completes, status becomes ''completed''

Next: Update roster generator to use new assignment structure
